text: The only place I want to see tariffs is on China. Their current threats are part of B

Every day we wait and don't address the Black maternal health crisis in America is a day we allow more mothers to be at risk.

My Maternal CARE Act would help address the public health crisis of Black mothers being 3 to 4 times more likely to die from pregnancy-related causes.

In South Carolina, unbelievably the standard, according to the state Supreme Court, is that children only get a “minimally adequate education.”

How disgraceful is that!

We are going to guarantee every kid in America an excellent education, not a "minimally adequate" one. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1129795913755570178/img/DQPifmcNC6_c51PD.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1129795913755570178/vid/320x180/TUgdhWNfzH3LUmnm.mp4?tag=12

Republicans gifted corporations & the top 1% with more than a trillion dollars in tax cuts. This was a scam for hardworking Americans.

That's why the very first bill I reintroduced this year was the LIFT the Middle Class Act—a real tax cut for middle class & working families.

As president, I will not appoint anyone to the United States Supreme Court unless they are prepared to defend Roe v.
